features: Advanced Auto-focus Webcam 1080P: Auto-focus camera with fast focusing speed and stable image quality. Make sure you're always in focus - even in low-light, high-contrast environments.

100 Degrees Wide-Angle view: Webcam 1080p captures video at a wide angle of up to 100 degrees, pro stream camera with advanced H.264 video compression technology provides you the excellent quality video on most software

Built-in Omnidirectional Stereo Microphone: The upgraded microphone and audio processing chip will detect noise and subtract it from the output, while also expanding the sound recognition range to improve call quality.

USB webcam with Wide Compatibility: This Webcam is Suitble for PC/Mac/Laptop/Desktop and Compatible with Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 or higher. The compatibility of the streaming camera is super wide for major software like Zoom, Tik Tok, Skype, YouTube, and more. Easy installation, driver-free installation.
body.description: Feature:1080P FHD DefinationWith layers lens combination, this webcam is able to captures video and images at a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels, deliver a more immersive and professional visual experience, allowing users to communicate effectively and present themselves with greater clarity during video calls and recordings.100° Wide Viewing AngleThe webcam comes with 100° wide viewing angle, easily capture and share your more creative space with audience.Built-in Audio Pickup-High Efficiency Noise - Cancelling MicrophoneThe webcam built-in audio pickup, easy to capture clear and natural stereo audio, no need for external pickup equipment. Designed to filter out background noise and focus on capturing the speaker’s voice more clearly, the web camera with microphone helps improve audio quality and enhances communication during online interactions.Compatible with Popular Live Streaming SoftwareThe webcam is compatible with your favorite streaming software like OBS, effortlessly streams to Instagram, Tiktok, Facebook and other platform. It also works as Well of Video Conferencing.Wide CompatibilityCompatible with Windows 7/10/11, MacOS10.10 or higher, Linux, Android TV 7.0 or higher. Super wide compability for major software like Zoom, Teams, Google Meet, Skype and more. Whether it's for online learning, home office meeting, or video calling, the webcam gets whatever you need.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Automatic Light Correction & Premium Autofocus Streaming clear video, provides outstanding performance even in dim light or poorly backlight settings. Video automatically adjust shadowy or harsh lighting conditions which makes you always look best on the camera. High sensitivity autofocus speed, get rid of tedious focusing process. HDR sensor and Facial-enhancement technology optimize image and beautify your appearance.

Excellent Humanized Design The Tripod-ready design with the universe base, the HD Camera can be attached to your monitor securely, easily fitting the top of the desktop, laptop or notebook. This streaming camera can be rotated in 360 degrees so you can adjust it to any position in need.

Built-in Omni-directional Stereo Mics Upgraded microphones and audio processing chip will detect noise and subtract it from the output to improve call quality. Advanced Auto-focus Webcam 1080P Auto-focus camera with fast focusing speed and stable image quality. Make sure you're always in focus - even in low-light, high-contrast environments. Wide-angle This PC Web camera is perfect for streaming on Xbox one, OBS, Twitch, Xsplit, and Mixer (Not compatible with PS4).

Compatible with Most Video Conferencing Apps & Services This 1080P camera dynamically captures clear video and superior audio for a near face-to-face experience no matter for meeting, video conferencing, family video chatting, gaming, webinars, and online classes via Skype, Google Hangouts, Yahoo!, AOL Instant Messenger, Zoom, ooVoo, Vsee, Windows Live Messenger, OBS, mixer, Youtube, Facebook, XSplit, Amazon Chime, LifeSize and FaceTime for Mac, laptop and PC, and other popular instant messaging applications. Driver free, it is easy and good to use with Windows 7, 8, 10 or later, Mac OS 10.6 or later; Google Chrome OS: V 29.0.1547.70 or later, Android Smart TV, and TV BOX V5.0 or later, Native Linux OS 2.6.24 or later; Ubuntu V10.04 or later, and Xbox One V10.0.1734.4056 or later.
